content: त्यागिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Leaving, abandoning, giving up &c. {@--2@} Giving away, a donor. {@--3@} Heroic, brave. {@--4@} Liberal. {@--5@} Sacrificing. {@--6@} One who does not look to any reward or result from the performance of ceremonial rites; यस्तु कर्मफलत्यागी स त्यागीत्यभिधीयते <ls>Bg. 18. 11.</ls>
